meta.label: API configuration
meta.description: Define presets for users to call the API with specific credentials, quota and parallelization parameters

params.name: separator_authentication
params.label: Authentication
params.description: Please refer to the Azure documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-gb/azure/cognitive-services/cognitive-services-apis-create-account/

params.name: azure_api_key
params.label: Azure API Key
params.description: If empty, attempts to ascertain key from the environment.

params.name: azure_region
params.label: Azure region
params.description: If empty, attempts to ascertain endpoint from the environment.

params.name: separator_api_quota
params.label: API quota
params.description: Throttling to stay within the quota defined by Azure: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cognitive-services/text-analytics/overview#data-limits

params.name: api_quota_period
params.label: Period
params.description: Reset period of the quota in seconds. Defined by Azure.

params.name: api_quota_rate_limit
params.label: Rate limit
params.description: Maximum number of requests per period for one DSS activity. Reduce for concurrent activities.

params.name: batch_size
params.label: Batch size
params.description: Number of rows to send to the API in batch (maximum 1000). Increase to speed-up computation within the quota defined above.

params.name: parallel_workers
params.label: Concurrency
params.description: Number of threads calling the API in parallel (maximum 100). Increase to speed-up computation within the quota defined above.
